response.job_title: Data Science | Business Intelligence | Data Analysis |
response.summary: Engineer with experience in the use of Microsoft Power Platform technologies (Power Bi, Power Automate, Power apps, etc) for the improvement and control of corporate processes. I have experience in the implementation of Artificial Intelligence models for the resolution and analysis of problems associated with the execution of repetitive tasks and business decision making. I have solid knowledge of the most widely used languages in Data Science (PYTHON, R-STATISTICS, SQL and DAX).
response.skills: Data Cleaning, Statistics, Teamwork, Relational Data Modeling, English, Data Modeling, Critical Thinking, Mathematics, Data Visualization, Aptitudes para hacer presentaciones, Informes, Tablas dinámicas, Microsoft PowerApps, Inteligencia empresarial, Panel de control, Análisis de datos, Conocimientos comerciales, Sistemas de Información Geográfica, Datos geoespaciales, Datasets

company.name: ABATECH
company.description:
We love changing people's lives; it is in our DNA. Technology is the best facilitator to make that change in healthcare by creating better systems that understand data, anticipate needs, and collaborate for better outcomes.  
•	We currently have high-performing team members in roles such as: BackEnd RoR experts, FrontEnd React maniacs, BI specialists, AI passionate, AWS/DevOps guardians, QA shields, UX-UI mind readers, and many other creative thinking jobs that make us UNIQUE.
•	We know people are our Competitive Advantage, which is why we treat them well. We want our people to fall in love with what we do and, most of all, with the company where we work. We follow a shared cause: to improve health services through our tech expertise.
•	ABA Tech offers benefits proving that belief in Employees is one of the fundamentals of the Company.
•	As HealthCare Tech-Troopers, we know we deserve to work with the best technology. From the hardware to the software, we are provided with all we need to perform in an optimal creation environment. Now, all we need is warriors like you!
•	We know that the quality of our products goes hand-in-hand with our knowledge and critical thinking. That's why we leverage a variety of technological tools and programming languages to make this possible and go beyond the expected.
Do not hesitate to contact our Recruitment Team.  Who knows, perhaps you can have the honor of joining this Tech-Squad!
